alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Norman, northeastern Cass and southeastern Traill Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Blanchard, or 35 miles northwest of Fargo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kelso and Hillsboro around 835 PM CDT. Grandin around 840 PM CDT. Halstad and Hendrum around 855 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include American Crystal Sugar. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 88 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota.
